website_summaries.verdict: This refreshing spray soothes and clarifies acne-prone skin without being too harsh or drying.
pros: This spray contains a combination of salicylic acid and natural ingredients like peppermint and tea tree oil to clear up acne-prone skin and keep it hydrated
It dries quickly and won't stain skin or clothing
cons: It doesn't work as well on some cases of bad acne as users had hoped

customer_reviews.title: Works great on body acne
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had an issue with acne on my back for quite a while, and this seemed to work better than anything else I’ve tried in calming it down
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sucked in by all of the great reviews
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered about $200 worth of product from treeactive and tried nearly every acne product of theirs. And I see on every product it says review for a free second bottle.. I don't want the second free bottle. None of these products worked for me. My acne had no change. I used all products religiously. I was really hoping to find this to be the answer for me and solve all of my body acne and face acne issues. I know each of you are different but this did not work for me at all. I really wanted it to.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I used this product on my back. It worked well, quickly absorb into the skin and smelled good. Looking to purchase another bottle.
customer_reviews.author: YEE YEE

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the BEST for quickly getting rid of terrible back or body acne! I keep rebuying it over and over because it’s the only product that can keep my skin clear. One bottle with daily use lasts me about 3-4 weeks. The scent is a little strong at first, but still pleasant, and as it soaks into my skin, it just has a lovely “fresh” fragrance to it. I’m a forever-customer!
customer_reviews.author: JulieJoyLovezz

customer_reviews.title: Great cheaper alternative to Murad body spray
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with small patches of acne on my back and chest area, especially in the summer or when I am working out regularly. I've tried acne body washes and lotions and all they do is dry out my skin and make the acne even worse. I used the Murad acne body spray and it helped, but it was so expensive I didn't repurchase. Then I found this product which is less expensive and tried it. It is not as powerful as the Murad but does do the job. I like the spray nozzle and it lasted me several months. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Parry

customer_reviews.title: Only product that has worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: I started getting adult acne on my back last year. It started slowly and then got progressively worse. My body just randomly decided that it didn’t want to agree with my sweat after I would work out. It was painful, annoying, made me insecure, and was just an eye sore.. I tried body washes, showering as soon as I was done exercising, exfoliating, and other body acne sprays. This was the ONLY product that worked for me! It took a couple months for it to fully clear up, but that’s expected. I’m so excited because now I don’t feel so self conscious when I wear shirts that expose my back.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Cant live without!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love TreeActiv Acne Eliminating Body Spray because I notice it truly helps get rid of my deep painful acne, the redness/scarring too. I also love that it’s all natural and has a pleasant light scent. It doesn’t leave your skin feeling dry or oily. I’ve tried so many different acne medication, creams, and sprays. However TreeActiv is the only product that truly works for me. I noticed a difference with my skin in just a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Seay

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't have permanent effects but works
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Easy to use. -Somewhat removes black heads. -Stops new acne from spawning at the targeted areas (only while using it constantly). Cons: -Seems to get more expensive by the day. -Isn't a permanent solution, you stop using it, acne is back. -Doesn't take effect fast enough, while you do feel the process immediately after spraying it, it doesn't show results until you use it for ~14 days straight -New acne will spawn in another near spot, when I cleared my back, I got acne on my side.
customer_reviews.author: MHkaserz

customer_reviews.title: Bottle leaking in package alon arrival.
customer_reviews.text: Well upon arrival the bottle was leaking in the package nothing Spilled Out of the package but it sucks that there was some lost. I like the way it feels when drying but I do not care for the spray coverage. It is very spotty and where you are actually aiming at it does not actually spray more or less around the area rather than directly at the area. As for how well it works this is only day one so not too sure. However I have purchased numerous out of other items from this company in the past I'm hoping that all of them together will show me more results.
customer_reviews.author: nicole r.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Love the way the product feels once it hits the skin, have been using for two weeks now. Can’t say I’ve noticed a dramatic difference on my back but I will keep applying.
customer_reviews.author: Lanae

customer_reviews.title: Work
customer_reviews.text: The product is very great. It works well for me that is why I purchased the 2nd bottle. Also, I love the natural scent of it.
customer_reviews.author: Vu Ho

customer_reviews.title: I can see a definite difference in breakouts using this
customer_reviews.text: I use this every night before bed. I spray it over my shoulders, chest, and upper back, and I can see a noticeable difference in existing breakouts in the morning, and I almost never get new ones when I use it. I didn't use it once last week and got a breakout the next morning. It has a cooling effect and minty smell that I think is nice. The body lotion is good too.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: The free product link doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Why my review is hidden ??? This actually works, I saw the difference while using it. My backacne reduced but not the scars or black spots. So far I have used 4 bottles of these, stopped for a while to see if this really worked and the result was bad. I again have the backacne now. Got new one to start from beginning, let’s see how it works Secondary- Got a card for free next time free purchase and it has a link to the actual product website which is missing. That was really disappointing, the link is no more active . I was cheated by the product
customer_reviews.author: Ashok Gopi

customer_reviews.title: Smells Nice But That's All
customer_reviews.text: On the bottle, it says "Acne Eliminating Body Spray" however the main ingredient to make this happen is Salicylic Acid which is listed at the bottom of the ingredient list so this is not the main active ingredient. Basically, what is in this bottle is Peppermint, Spearmint and Tea Tree WATER that smells nice that but that's all. Perhaps this may work as a daily body spray to prevent acne but not good for treating acne that is already there especially if it is in a concentrated in one area like the back. Also, it doesn't spray well upside down.
customer_reviews.author: T Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: it does have a scent.. but its a light scent and a little minty its not over powering. But worked amazingly after a few days acne was gone
customer_reviews.author: Krissy Noel

customer_reviews.title: Very effective pimple fighting solution
customer_reviews.text: Nice body spray Expensive but worth it Say goodbye to back and chest acne in just one week Im buying again
customer_reviews.author: Mel B.

customer_reviews.title: Cleared my back acne from sweat!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this spray! I work out almost every day and tend to break out easily because I sweat so much. I carry this with me in my gym bag. i immediately spray on my back and change my shirt after my workouts. It’s helped clear my back acne and prevents from any future breakouts. I’ll even spray some again after showering. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Adri

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I suffered a very bad acne on my back and chest for the longest time. I bought this product and used it for a few months. Gradually pimples on my back and chest stopped growing and now they are totally gone. My back and chest has never been this clear! I recommend this to everyone and give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Mariela

customer_reviews.title: Price more than doubled?
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell and where the spray works. It was $22 a bottle when I bought it. At $47 a bottle I will definitely pass.
customer_reviews.author: TREVORG

customer_reviews.title: Works well and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use out of the shower, dries fast, and really has cut down on body acne.

customer_reviews.title: The BEST product on the market to eliminate acne.
customer_reviews.text: This product works from the first spray on. I started to see results immediately. I love this acne elimating body spray. It does exactly what it says, it eliminates the acne. Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Effectiveness
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great! I spray my face & body. It dries up breakouts.

customer_reviews.title: Goes away within 1-2 days :)
customer_reviews.text: My acne is gone within the next or two days. I have sensitive skin I don’t know how yours will react but my family got onto this after me ! And they love it :) ( acne issues too and such ) saves us when we expose our skin a bit cause the acne is gone!

customer_reviews.title: Fast acting and soothing

I’ve never suffered from acne problems and at almost 40 years old this really took me for a loop. Your spray was a life saver!

customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying directly from their website since when I buy from amazon the bottle has been different as well as the ingredients. This is pretty disappointing since the original formula works amazing. Inconsistency.

customer_reviews.title: I'm liking it!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for 1 week, though I have not seen much of a difference yet, I am enjoying the product. I have been using it as an after shave, a back spray for pesky back acne and sheet & pillow spritzer to disinfect. I am happy with it thus far and will update my review in a few weeks time when I have had a chance to notice any changes to my skin. It smells very clean and is not bothersome at all.

customer_reviews.title: I like that it's a natural product
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working. I also use it to disinfect my yoga mat. The alcohol in it (or whichever ingredient it is) causes me to gag sometimes if I've sprayed it liberally. I like that it's a natural product.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing. I have suffered from body break outs for ...

I have been using this stuff for about a week and can already see a huge difference! I'm assuming in the next week or so I should be clear. If you are considering buying this, definitely give it a try! I'm so happy I did.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff actually works! I have been cursed with back acne for pretty much my whole life, and this stuff is a life saver. It’s also great that it’s made from all natural ingredients unlike most other treatments, so it definitely decreases the chances of reacting to any of the chemicals in the formula. It also can act as an after shave and as a disinfect which is a huge plus!

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I bought it for my boyfriend to help with his back acne and I was so impressed with the results I started using it as a spot treatment for blemishes on my face. I just spray a little bit on a cotton round and dab it on the blemish, within a day or two the blemish completely disappears! And the best part is it doesn’t dry out my skin the way other acne products do. I absolutely recommend this acne eliminating spray, it’s amazing!

customer_reviews.title: ... this spray for almost a week now and I like how it feels on my skin

I'm hopeful it will help my skin with continued use, I appreciate that it is all natural. Update, after using a full bottle, I have purchased a second. It really helps breakouts and is such a nice part of my skincare routine.

This spray seems to be help with the overall quality of my skin too - it looks to be lightning the darker spots on top of clearing acne. I highly recommend!

I would not recommend spending the money if you are looking to treat this sort of problem.

product_meta.title: TreeActiv Acne Eliminating Body Spray | Natural Body, Back, Butt, Chest and Shoulder Acne Treatment | Salicylic Acid | Tea Tree | Aloe | Witch Hazel | Menthol | Mint | Men, Women, Teens | 8 fl oz
product_meta.description:
The Most Powerful and Effective Natural Anti Acne Body Spray

The natural ingredients in this body spray are quickly absorbed into the skin to eliminate acne and clear harmful irritants. Effective against all forms of body acne, including back, butt, shoulder, thigh, and chest acne. The spray also works as an effective after shave to reduce irritation and razor burn. In addition, you can spritz it onto gym or sports equipment, yoga mats, bedding, and towels to quickly freshen them up.

How to Use

Body Spray: Spray over your body, paying close attention to acne prone areas. Allow to dry and do not rinse off. Use as often as desired.

For best results, cleanse body with TreeActiv Acne Exfoliating Body Wash prior to application, and follow with TreeActiv Acne Eliminating Body Lotion.

After Shave: Apply to skin after shaving to help prevent irritation and razor burn.

Powerful Natural Ingredients

Peppermint Water, Spearmint Water, Tea Tree Water, Witch Hazel, Salicylic Acid, Aloe Oil, Menthol Crystals, Eucalyptus Oil

Find Your Solution Guarantee

At TreeActiv, we understand that there is no one size fits all solution to skin issues, so we stand by all our products with the Find Your Solution Guarantee. If this product isn’t the solution to your skin problems, we will work with you to find a different a TreeActiv product that is, and provide you with a full refund.
feature_bullets: CLEAR ALL TYPES OF BODY ACNE & PREVENT FUTURE BREAKOUTS: Our mess-free, non-staining body spray not only helps clear existing acne from the back, chest, shoulders, butt, and thighs, it moisturizes the skin and infuses it with the vitamins and minerals your skin needs to stay healthy and prevent future breakouts.

GENTLE ENOUGH FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: Benzoyl peroxide-based products are great at treating acne, but they also cause dry skin, swelling, and inflammation, often making the problem worse. Our body spray only uses natural ingredients that safely heal acne without damaging your skin, making it a more effective and safer treatment than traditional acne products.

UNIQUE NATURAL FORMULA: Lots of formulas use salicylic acid to fight acne, but few make use of other natural ingredients. Our body spray is a carefully crafted combination of salicylic acid and other natural ingredients like tea tree water and peppermint water that work in harmony to clear acne and hydrate your skin.

USE AS AN AFTERSHAVE TOO: Thanks to our body spray’s soothing properties, it makes a great aftershave that calms the skin and prevents irritation and razor burn. You can even try it on your sports equipment, yoga mats, bedding and towels to clean and refresh the materials your skin touches the most.

GUARANTEED RESULTS: We know that our Acne Eliminating Body Spray is the best, most effective acne treatment available, so we back our product with a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you’re ever unsatisfied, simply message us and we will provide a full refund while also trying to find a different product that will work better for you.
